titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of industrial nitrocellulose.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/7/2008--Introduced. Provides for the reliquidation of, and refund of collected excess antidumping duties (including interest) to the importer of record on, certain entries of industrial nitrocellulose.
